content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #3643:

Hurray it worked! I'm thinking now though that despite this being probably too late to be a meaningful patch release I'd like to go ahead and push forward with it because it can exercise the workflows we have. For example this won't actually release anything unless https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3644 is merged. I'll prep that backport once it's ready.

@cfallin would you be up for updating RELEASES.md here? I'm not actually sure the best process for that. In theory we want RELEASES.md updated on the main branch as well, so perhaps a PR against main which is cherry-picked onto this PR as well?

cfallin commented on issue #3643:

Sure, I actually already updated RELEASES.md in this branch when we initially tried pushing the button; the only issue is the date is Dec 17. I'll do a quick PR to update that, and another to update the releases list on the main branch.

github-actions[bot] commented on issue #3643:
